abstract: Barbara Smith, better known as B. Smith, has her smile imprinted on all sorts of things, from biscuits to shower curtains, and is always on the lookout for the next trend.
snippet: Barbara Smith, better known as B. Smith, has her smile imprinted on all sorts of things, from biscuits to shower curtains, and is always on the lookout for the next trend.
lead_paragraph: BARBARA SMITH, better known as B. Smith, the founder and chief creative officer of B. Smith Enterprises, says that no matter where she is or what she is doing, she is on the lookout for the next trend. Her husband, Dan Gasby, the company’s chairman, says her sense of what will connect with a wide audience is pivotal to the success of their businesses.

headline.main: Restaurants Lead to Kitchens and to Other Rooms
headline.print_headline: Restaurants Lead to Kitchens and to Other Rooms
